item.description:
We have a good group of new and experienced Snowboarders heading north this weekend to Wildcat.  If anyone would like to extend their fun I will host a weekend at The Wedeln Ski House in Bartlett.

The ski house is set up hostel style with most bedrooms containing 2 bunk beds.  We have comfy common areas including a living room with fireplace, commercial size kitchen (prepare your own foods, no meal plan this weekend) and large entertainment space.  Cost is $25 per night, per person  - $15 cancellation fee applies.  If possible try to stay both Friday and Saturday, we will have some apres options.

I will do a Meet & Greet on Friday starting at 8pm but feel free to arrive anytime before midnight.

The house is located in the town of Bartlett NH, just north or the North Conway town line, full directions will be emailed to all that sign up to stay.

Please check out http://www.wedeln.com/about.html

the house is 21+ only, please bring your own sheets, towel, blanket and pillow. This event will close to new reservations on Wednesday at 3pm so please sign up ASAP.
item.how_to_find_us: I will email directions to all that confirm.
item.name: Weekend at Wedeln Ski House
